title: No Mastery 7 token after getting S- on Summoners Rift.
body:
I have Yasuo at level 6, and i have gotten 2 Mastery 7 tokens but now when im trying to get my 3rd i dont recieve it, even though ive gotten S many times, my most recent game i recieved S- but still no token.

Heres proof that i got S rank: https://gyazo.com/390ef916f777e9ca6f8696fe9cef8e52

replies.body:
Mastery Level 7 tokens can only be obtained by getting an S or S+. Be sure to read up on the other little details in the [**Champion Mastery FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284#h1q5)

https://i.gyazo.com/ea4da0f6722d6aea929d7db703d7687c.png
It is because S- isn't good enough for a mastery 7 token you need to get either an S or a S+. Kind of a shame that 40 kills did warrant an S but that's something else to complain about. :p
